org.antfarmer.ejce.util

Class MessageDigestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.util.MessageDigestUtil

  • public class MessageDigestUtil
extends Object
    Utility providing methods to compute simple message digests (hashes) using various algorithms.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALGORITHM_MD2
      The MD2 message digest algorithm as defined in RFC 1319.
      static String ALGORITHM_MD5
      The MD5 message digest algorithm as defined in RFC 1321.

      The SHA-512 algorithm defined in FIPS PUB 180-4.

      The SHA-512/256 algorithm defined in FIPS PUB 180-4.

      The SHA3-384 Permutation-based hash and extendable-output function as defined in FIPS PUB 202.

      The SHA3-512 Permutation-based hash and extendable-output function as defined in FIPS PUB 202.

    • Field Detail

      • ALGORITHM_MD2

        public static final String ALGORITHM_MD2
        The MD2 message digest algorithm as defined in RFC 1319. Produces a 128 bit digest.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALGORITHM_MD5

        public static final String ALGORITHM_MD5
        The MD5 message digest algorithm as defined in RFC 1321. Produces a 128 bit digest.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALGORITHM_SHA1

        public static final String ALGORITHM_SHA1
        The SHA1 algorithm defined in FIPS PUB 180-4. Produces a 160 bit digest.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALGORITHM_SHA3_224

        public static final String ALGORITHM_SHA3_224
        The SHA3-224 Permutation-based hash and extendable-output function as defined in FIPS PUB 202. SHA3-224 produces a 224 bit digest.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • hashString

        public static String hashString(String text,
                                String algorithm,
                                Provider provider,
                                String providerName)
                         throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                NoSuchProviderException
        Hashes the given text using the given MessageDigest algorithm and encodes the result using a Base64Encoder.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        algorithm - the MessageDigest algorithm
        provider - the JCE-compliant provider (may be null)
        providerName - the name of the JCE-compliant provider (may be null)
        Returns:
        a hash of the given text
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - NoSuchAlgorithmException
        NoSuchProviderException - NoSuchProviderException
